mapper.insert: INSERT INTO class_request (id_class_request, class_date, make_up_date, remarks, app_date, id_prof, id_sched, id_pgm, id_room) VALUES (#{idClassRequest}, #{classDate}, #{makeUpDate}, #{remarks}, now(), #{idProf}, #{idSched}, #{idPgm}, #{idRoom})
mapper.update: UPDATE class_request SET class_date = #{classDate}, make_up_date = #{makeUpDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, app_date = #{appDate}, proc_date = #{procDate} WHERE id_class_request = #{idClassRequest}
mapper.select: SELECT cr.id_class_request, cr.class_date, cr.make_up_date, cr.remarks, cr.app_date, cr.proc_date, s.day_sched, pg.pgm_name, c.room_name FROM class_request cr JOIN schedule s ON cr.id_sched = s.id_sched JOIN program pg ON cr.id_pgm = pg.id_pgm JOIN class_room c ON cr.id_room = c.id_room WHERE cr.id_pgm = #{idPgm}
